greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Diagonal sums of a Chebyshev number triangle.
comment: Diagonal sums of number triangle A101124.
link: Index entries for sequences related to Chebyshev polynomials.
formula: a(n)=sum{k=0..floor(n/2), if(k<n-k, T(n-2k, k), if(k=n-k, 1, 0))} where T(n, k)=(n/2)sum{j=0..floor(n/2), C(n-j, j)(-1)^j*(2k)^(n-2j)}.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Dec 02 2004
